IB is about so much more than just numbers. And that can be scary, but itâ€™s also exhilarating because weâ€™re finally getting a taste of the real-world and all the responsibility that comes with it. Recently, Iâ€™ve been asked by a lot of people â€œWhy do you still come to school?â€. They seem so puzzled, so absolutely flabbergasted.
